Text:
kaspersky 2012 says "HEUR:Trojan.Win32.Generic"
so what is this ???

AV software may warn about keygens, patches, cracks etc because of their 
    capabilities and signatures (generating codes, etc). Sometimes also they're 
    added to the virus/spyware database and will be detected as malware.

why do people who use crappy anti virus like AVG and AVAST always moan about viruses!

if you bothered to take the time you complain with into finding a proper anti virus you might realise its not a virus! 

of course it will say its a virus microshit pays the companys to detect it as a virus to stop piracy!

if your that bothered about downloading this version google it and download from official site and then let your crappy anti virus tell you its still a virus!

for the record i just downloaded this version and scanned it... also checked it with 7zip and its fine

scanned with ESET SMART SECURITY
